about_the_game:
The Backrooms Deluxe: Founder's Edition is packed with features that take your game experience to the next level. This DLC is automatically available to anyone who purchased the game, but if you're playing the free version, you'll need to pick it up to enjoy all the perks. Here's a breakdown of everything included:

1500 DeluxeCoins

Kickstart your journey with 1500 DeluxeCoins right off the bat. These coins can be used to unlock glowsticks, power-ups, and other in-game items that enhance your survival chances and style. Whether you're gearing up for a tough level or just want to mess around in the levels, these coins give you a solid head start.

Expanded Multiplayer

Tired of exploring the eerie halls of the Backrooms with just one friend? The Founder's Edition unlocks the ability to play multiplayer with more than two people. Now, you can gather a full squad to dive into the madness together. Whether you're strategizing or just having fun, the expanded multiplayer mode adds a whole new dimension to your experience. MULTIPLAYER MAY BE LIMITED OR DISABLED TEMPORARLY AT ANY TIME! WHENEVER IT'S GOING TO BE DISABLED FOR MAINTENANCE, A WARNING WILL SHOW UP A FEW DAYS EARLIER IN THE MENU.

"Challenges" Gamemode

Looking for a new way to test your skills? The Founder's Edition introduces the "Challenges" gamemode. In this mode, you'll face a variety of unique scenarios that push your abilities to the limit. Each challenge offers a different twist, from timed escapes to resource management tasks. It's a fresh way to experience the game and see just how good you are at navigating the Backrooms.

Access to Level 9

The Backrooms are full of mysterious and unsettling places, and with the Founder's Edition, you gain access to the newly unlocked Level 9. This area is shrouded in mystery, with new puzzles, threats, and secrets waiting to be uncovered. Only the bravest explorers will venture into its depths—are you up for the challenge?

short_description: The Backrooms Deluxe: Founder's Edition is a special DLC that gives you 1500 DeluxeCoins, lets you play multiplayer with more than two people, unlocks the new "Challenges" gamemode, and grants access to the mysterious Level 9.
